body_html:
@crjensen21 I got it to work. You need to link in a bunch of TF libraries. I used the following

TF_INC         :=$(shell python -c 'import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.sysconfig.get_include())')
TF_LIB         :=$(shell find $(TF_INC)/../ -name "*.so")

Those are all the include files you need and the associate libraries. Link them in however your compiler does it. I did,

g++ -std=c++11 -shared $(CC_FILES) -o mylib.so -fPIC $(INC) $(LIBS)

Also, you need to build TF with more headers. I used this patch,

diff --git a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
index 6a3f66b..c88840a 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
+++ b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
@@ -26,6 +26,8 @@ transitive_hdrs(
         "//tensorflow/core:core_cpu",
         "//tensorflow/core:framework",
         "//tensorflow/core:lib",
+        "//tensorflow/core:proto_text",
+        "//tensorflow/core:all_kernels",
         "//tensorflow/core:protos_all_cc",
         "//tensorflow/core:stream_executor",
         "//third_party/eigen3",

@crjensen21 I got it to work. You need to link in a bunch of TF libraries. I used the following
TF_INC         :=$(shell python -c 'import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.sysconfig.get_include())')
TF_LIB         :=$(shell find $(TF_INC)/../ -name "*.so")

Those are all the include files you need and the associate libraries. Link them in however your compiler does it. I did,
g++ -std=c++11 -shared $(CC_FILES) -o mylib.so -fPIC $(INC) $(LIBS)

Also, you need to build TF with more headers. I used this patch,
diff --git a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD

         "//third_party/eigen3",
body:
@crjensen21 I got it to work. You need to link in a bunch of TF libraries. I used the following

```
TF_INC         :=$(shell python -c 'import tensorflow as tf; print(tf.sysconfig.get_include())')
TF_LIB         :=$(shell find $(TF_INC)/../ -name "*.so")
```

Those are all the include files you need and the associate libraries. Link them in however your compiler does it. I did,

```
g++ -std=c++11 -shared $(CC_FILES) -o mylib.so -fPIC $(INC) $(LIBS)
```

Also, you need to build TF with more headers. I used this patch,

```
diff --git a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
index 6a3f66b..c88840a 100644
--- a/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
+++ b/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/BUILD
@@ -26,6 +26,8 @@ transitive_hdrs(
         "//tensorflow/core:core_cpu",
         "//tensorflow/core:framework",
         "//tensorflow/core:lib",
+        "//tensorflow/core:proto_text",
+        "//tensorflow/core:all_kernels",
         "//tensorflow/core:protos_all_cc",
         "//tensorflow/core:stream_executor",
         "//third_party/eigen3",
```
